long_description: Improving a proven design, the BPA-free CamelBak Antidote 50 fl. oz. reservoir offers a host of new convenient features for hassle-free hydration. CamelBak Antidote reservoir features a huge access port for easy filling; now with a new cap that is easier to open and close. Access port is large enough to put your hand inside, so cleaning becomes a simple task. Integrated baffle keeps water from sloshing side to side as you move and twist while wearing your pack. Equipped with the Quick Link(TM) connection system for hassle-free removal of the drinking tube. Big Bite(TM) valve is easy to use-just bite and sip; HydroLock(TM) valve shuts off water, preventing leakage during transport.
short_description: Improving a proven design, the BPA-free CamelBak Antidote 50 fl. oz. reservoir offers a host of new convenient features for hassle-free hydration.
